title: The Call of the Wild (Part 5)
description: Buck claims his place as the new leader of the sled dogs. The team makes a record-setting run before being turned over to a new driver. Dave, a dog on Buck's team, grows very sick until he can't keep up and is shot.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
reviewWords: Use the reading strategy of making, revising, and confirming predictions, to understand a text
comprehension: Hyphenated and Compound Words                : Identify and use hyphenated compound adjectives
